GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.68
GSD.description:
IB/core: Fix a nested dead lock as part of ODP flow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.68 by commit 819110054b14d7272b4188db997a3d80f75ab785, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 36f30e486dce22345c2dd3a3ba439c12cd67f6ba. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: IB/core: Fix a nested dead lock as part of ODP flow
